title: Best of the Program | Guest: Bill Gertz | 10/8/19
description:
Glenn and Stu confirm that “Joker” is MUCH better than the “white male resentment” story CNN says it is. Ilhan Omar is divorcing her husband, but apparently, WE’RE to blame. And is Trump greenlighting Turkey to kill the Kurds or just implementing a long-awaited exit strategy? Hope for America looks more like Ellen DeGeneres, Kanye West, and Brandt Jean than it does out-of-control social justice and pandering to China. Bill Gertz, author of “Deceiving the Sky,” calls in to describe how China’s strategy of lies and deception is a MASSIVE threat to our freedom.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
